EASILY my favorite visit of my entire time in Spain!  It is truly a shame if you miss out on the pinxos experience, and this place takes the cake.  There are plates full of small sandwiches and appetizer like foods and you fill up your plate cafeteria style.  When you are ready to pay, they simply add up the toothpicks.  It is SUCH a fun way to eat and you can try so many different things, eat only a small meal, or just get to see what there is to offer before you eat.This place gets BUSY so you need to go early (7ish) or late (10ish) if you want a chance at a table.
